text: Ferral is a freguesia (civil parish) in the municipality of Montalegre, Vila Real District, Portugal. Ferral may also refer to: * Ferral C. Dininny (1818–1901), American businessman and politician in New York State ==See also== * Ferrals-les-Corbières, a commune in the Aude department, southern France ** US Ferrals XIII, an amateur rugby league club based in Ferrals-les- Corbières * Ferrals-les-Montagnes, a commune in the Hérault department, southern France * Feral (disambiguation) * Ferrol (disambiguation) *
title: Ferral (disambiguation)
